title: Clan not available
body: Hopefully this is the correct section. I've not had access to my clan in.. months? A few friends say I'm still the leader, but it gives no indication that I'm even in a clan. It's just slightly annoying that It asks me to create one, when I already have one. I'm unaware of this still being an issue, or what I could do to fix it.

replies.body: There was recently an issue with leaders seeing their clubs, but should be resolved.  If you're still having an issue, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a look individually.  We'll reply back asap.
